channel.title: MicroConf Europe 2015 Talk Recaps / Notes
channel.description:
Hey folks,
MicroConf Europe took place last week in Barcelona. I took extensive notes of all the talks (transcripts for many talks will follow), which you can find here: http://www.it-engelhardt.de/microconf-europe-2015-notes-and-noteworthy/
Cheers, Christoph
PS: Notes to Peldi's talk are password-protected as requested by him. Sorry, folks

item.title: MicroConf Europe 2015 Talk Recaps / Notes
item.dc:creator: itengelhardt
item.description:
Thanks for the kind words, @irina & @SteveMcLeod.
I always enjoy doing them and get a kick out of it. So I do it for entirely selfish reasons
Just kidding, it’s a small way to give back to the community.

Read full topic
